snippet: At a time of looming budget cuts, advocates of government financing of technology research argue that it is an investment in the nation’s future.
abstract: Steve Lohr Unboxed column says that at a time of looming budget cuts, advocates of government financing of technology research argue it plays a vital role in incubating new ideas that are harvested by the private sector, sometimes many years later, creating companies and jobs.
lead_paragraph: At a time of looming budget cuts, advocates of government financing of technology research argue that it is an investment in the nation’s future.

headline.seo: Making the Case for a Government Hand in Research
headline.main: The Seeds That Federal Money Can Plant
